College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Daman at Daman and Diu, is a state-run college, which has created a space for itself in Damn and Diu ever since its inception. It offers diploma courses in 7 Engineering branches. Admissions to this reputed college is strictly based on merit and the qualification required to apply to this college is that the candidate should have passed the Std. X examination. Big companies like Reliance Industries Ltd., PSL Ltd, Mouldcare, and Super Knit Industries, etc. visit the campus to recruit students.

College_Name: National Institute of Fashion Technology - [NIFT], Daman
Indian Institute of Information Technology Vadodara - International Campus Diu -[IIITV-ICD], Diu

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Computer Science  and Engineering)
